Sentencas: This study presents the integration of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell with a gas turbine (DA-SOFC/GT) in a novel combined cooling, heating and power (CHCP) cycle.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle

Sentencas: The integration strategy is compared for oxygen ion-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC-O) and hydrogen proton-conducting solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC-H).
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle

Sentencas: Unlike hybrid SOFC-absorption heat pumps, the current system is designed to exploit the refrigeration properties of ammonia to provide cooling with minimal bearing on complexity and capital cost.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle

Sentencas: A system analysis is developed to cover both electrochemical and thermodynamic modelling.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle

Sentencas: A detailed parametric study is also conducted to investigate the effects of varying the operating conditions and parameters on the energy and exergy efficiencies and the overall system performance.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle

Sentencas: The results reveal that the SOFC-H integrated system offers better performance than that with the SOFC-O option.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle

Sentencas: At an operating temperature of 1073 K and a pressure of 500 kPa, the respective energy and exergy efficiencies of the SOFC-H integrated cycle reach 81.1% and 74.3% compared to 76.7% and 69.9% for the SOFC-O. Under the same operating conditions, the cooling effectiveness of the system with both SOFC types becomes 14.7% based on the lower heating value (LHV) of ammonia.
Titulo: Energy and exergy analyses of direct ammonia solid oxide fuel cell integrated with gas turbine power cycle
